mapper.select: select m.*, snm.quantity_notice from shipment_notice_merchandise snm inner join merchandise m on m.id = snm.merchandise_id where snm.shipment_notice_id = #{id} and snm.is_delete = 0
select * from shipment_notice where id = #{id} and is_delete = 0

select distinct m.*, om.label_option, om.quantity_required, snm.quantity_notice, sqs.total_quantity_shipped from shipment_notice_merchandise snm inner join merchandise m on m.id = snm.merchandise_id inner join order_merchandise om on om.order_id = #{orderId} and om.merchandise_id = snm.merchandise_id left join ( select sm2.merchandise_id, sum(sm2.quantity_shipped) total_quantity_shipped from ( select id from shipment_notice where id = #{id} and is_delete = 0 and status != 1 ) sn2 inner join shipment s2 on s2.shipment_notice_id = sn2.id inner join shipment_merchandise sm2 on sm2.shipment_id = s2.id where sm2.is_delete = 0 group by sm2.merchandise_id ) sqs on sqs.merchandise_id = m.id where snm.shipment_notice_id = #{id} and snm.is_delete = 0
select distinct s.* from ( select * from shipment where shipment_notice_id = #{id} and is_delete = 0 ) s inner join shipment_merchandise sm on sm.shipment_id = s.id
